title: Two bodies found in search for Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira in Amazon
content:
1. Two bodies found in search for Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira in Amazon  The Independent
  2. No bodies found in hunt for journalist and expert, Brazil police say  Reuters
  3. Dom Phillips and Bruno Pereira: Police deny bodies found in Amazon search  BBC
  4. Protesters Demand Answers Over Two Men Missing In Amazon Rainforest  NBC News
  5. Human remains found in search for U.K. reporter Dom Phillips and Indigenous expert Bruno Pereira missing in the Amazon, Brazil's president says  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: アマゾンのDom PhillipsとBruno Pereiraの捜索で2人の遺体が発見された。
在亚马逊寻找多姆-菲利普斯和布鲁诺-佩雷拉时发现两具尸体
在亞馬遜尋找多姆-菲利普斯和布魯諾-佩雷拉時發現兩具屍體
